name: Handling mismatched new and confirm passwords

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a platform administrator
Log in as a platform administrator
And I navigate to the User Management section to update the password
Navigate to the User Management section
When I enter a new password that does not match the confirm password
Enter mismatched new and confirm passwords
Then an error message "Passwords do not match" is displayed
Verify error message for mismatched passwords
